May contain spoilers from Crown of the Kobold King **Source** [Crown of the Kobold King](/Sources.aspx?ID=148) pg. 115 **Price** 475 gp **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- This long, gnarled staff looks like several bones fused together, then wrapped tightly with strips of desiccated, gray skin. At the top of the staff, a clump of sinew clasps a small stone orb resembling a large human eye. When the staff is activated, this eye twitches and glances around randomly. When wielding this staff, you gain a +1 item bonus to visual Perception checks.
  • **Cantrip** [_read aura_](/Spells.aspx?ID=246)
  • **1st** [_true strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=345)
  • **2nd** [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [_flaming sphere_](/Spells.aspx?ID=121) (creates what appears to be a large eye made of fire), [_see invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=271)
  • **3rd** [_organsight_](/Spells.aspx?ID=963), [_web of eyes_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1032)
  • **4th** [_clairvoyance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=40), [_countless eyes_](/Spells.aspx?ID=680), [_detect scrying_](/Spells.aspx?ID=68)
**Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
name: Drazmorg's Staff of All-Sight
